title: Die Insel der besonderen Kinder
description: When Jacob discovers clues to a mystery that spans different worlds and times, he finds a magical place known as Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. But the mystery and danger deepen as he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers... and their powerful enemies. Ultimately, Jacob discovers that only his own special "peculiarity" can save his new friends. Written by 20th Century Fox
castList: [Eva Green, Asa Butterfield, Samuel L. Jackson, Judi Dench, Rupert Everett, Allison Janney, Chris O'Dowd, Terence Stamp, Ella Purnell, Finlay MacMillan, Lauren McCrostie, Hayden Keeler-Stone, Georgia Pemberton, Milo Parker, Raffiella Chapman]
characterList: [Miss Peregrine, Jake, Barron, Miss Avocet, Ornithologist, Dr. Golan, Franklin Portman, Abraham 'Abe' Portman, Emma Bloom, Enoch O'Conner, Olive Abroholos Elephanta, Horace Somnusson, Fiona Fruanfeld, Hugh Apiston, Claire Densmore]
